scene 1: 1873, England. The city of Belhelm is on the verge of collapse from crime and corruption, but that does not concern you as you are on the way to the scrapyard for work
scene 1 second day: You once again see the dull streets of the lower city as you go to work
scene 1 third day: Your last day on work for the week you feel as if something is gonna happen soon but forget about it
scene 1 question: Should I take the short cut, or should I go the usual way, but I could also go the longer way and meet with BOB
scene 1.1: In this scene you took the short cut and have run into a problem there are three ruffians in your way
scene 1.1 question: What shall thy do, Go back or go past them
scene 1.1.1: In this scene you run back and decide not to go that way for today and go another path
scene 1.1.2: In this scene you decide to go past the ruffians, they rob you of 2 cogs and let you off with a warning
scene 1.2: You take the normal way and nothing new happens and you get to the scrapyard
scene 1.3: You take the longer route meaning that you may be a bit late but you get to meet BOB
scene 1.3 question: BOB offers you a blueprint for 2 cogs saying this is your lucky day do you take it
scene 1.3.1: You purchase the blueprint and receive random blueprint and get to work late
scene 1.3.2/1.3.1: You get to work late and get shouted at by your boss and get 2 cogs less pay that day
scene 2: You arrive at a sprawling scrapyard of antique machinery, brass fittings, and hissing steam engines, a playground for Steampunk tinkerers and dreamers. But for you it just a scrapyard
scene 2.0.1: As your working you notice three glistening spots and decide to go and investiage them
scene 2 question: which one of the 3 spots do you go investigate
scene 2.1: You decide to investigate the first spot
scene 2.2: You decide to investigate the second spot
scene 2.3: You decide to investigate the third spot
scene 2.1.0.1: You find three suspicious piles of scrap and decide to take only one home
scene 2.1.0.1 question: Which one of the 3 piles do you take
scene 2.1.1: You decide to search through up pile 1 and receive random loot
scene 2.1.2: You decide to search through up pile 2 and receive a pile of useless scrap
scene 2.1.3: You decide to search through up pile 3 and receive  1 cog
scene 2.1.1 - 2.1.3: You take the item and notice some new spots
scene 2.2 question: Which one of the 3 new spots do you want to investiagte
scene 2.2.1: You decide to investigate the first spot
scene 2.2.2: You decide to investigate the second spot
scene 2.2.3: You decide to investigate the third spot
scene 2.2.0.1: You find three suspicious piles of scrap and decide to take one home
scene 2.2.0.1 question: Which one of the 3 piles do you take
scene 2.2.1.1: You decide to search through up pile 1 and receive random loot
scene 2.2.1.2: You decide to search through up pile 2 and receive a pile of useless scrap
scene 2.2.1.3: You decide to search through up pile 3 and receive  1 cog
scene 2.2.1.1 - 2.2.1.3: You take the item and  once again see another shiny area
scene 2.3 question: which one of the 3 area will you investigate
scene 2.3.0.1: you find a group of 3 shiny piles and decide to look through them
scene 2.3.0.1 question: Which one of the 3 piles are you going to search
scene 2.3.1: You decide to search through up pile 1 and receive random loot
scene 2.3.2: You decide to search through up pile 2 and receive a pile of useless scrap
scene 2.3.3: You decide to search through up pile 3 and receive  1 cog
scene 2 END: After collecting the scrap you get payed for work (4 cogs) and start making your way home
scene 3: While making your way home through rust caked and derelict streets you notice some sketchy people walking into an alleyway
scene 3 question: Do you want to go and investigate the group of people or continue on your way
scene 3.1: You decide to investigate the group
scene 3.1.1: You overhear the talk about if everything is ready and overhear three things 'we are ready', 'soon', 'we'll Win'
scene 3.1.1.1: Before you hear the rest, you hear noises behind you
scene 3.1 question: Do you want to investigate further or return to the street
scene 3.1.2: You decide to go and investigate but you run into an enforcer
scene 3.1.2.1: The enforcer sees you and begin to walk towards you, you decide to try and leave but you turn and there is a enforcer behind you and he hits you over the head with a heavy baton pulsing with electricity (Ending)
scene 3.1.3: You decide to go back to the street, meer moments after you exit the alley you hear shouting and screaming coming from the alleyway
scene 3.1.3.1: Afterwards you see 2 enforcers walk out the alleyway dragging 3 black bags on the floor
scene 3.1.3.2: After waiting for enforcers to leave you run back home quickly
scene 3.1.3.3: Once you got home you decide to think about what you have just seen
scene 3.1.3.4: After thinking about what you saw you decide to go to sleep
scene 3.2: You decide to not investigate and continue on your way home but feel a bit hungry and you buy a kebab for 1 cog
scene 3.2.1: You got home and decide to go to sleep so you can wake up for work tomorrow
scene 4: BOOM you awaken in cold sweat from a loud noise outside and as you look out your window you see 2 massive robots and numerous smaller ones fighting and you realise that you need to get to the scrapyard for safety
scene 4 question: Which way do you wanna get out of your house the back or the front
scene 4.1: You chose to leave through the backdoor and it seems safe for now and as you start making your way one of the massive robots fly towards you what do you do
scene 4.1 question: Do you try to run away from the impact site or do you try to hide under some of the nearby buildings
scene 4.1.1: You try to run away but the robot is too big and lands on you and crushes you
scene 4.1.2: You try to hide under some nearby buildings but a robot demolishes the building as it lands on it giving you a public burial
scene 4.2: You decide to go out the front door and as you run out you see one of the massive robots get thrown over you and land on the houses behind you demoloshing it them all
scene 4.2 question: As you run to the scrapyard you once again got to choose which way you will go
scene 4.2.1: You decide to go the short way and you get to the scrapyard 15 earlier than the normal way
scene 4.2.2: You decide to go the normal way and barely reach the scrapyard as you hear massive explosions go off and you hear a loudspeaker turn on
scene 4.2.3: You decide to go the long way and in the process check up on BOB but BOB doesn't seem to be there and while looking for him a loudspeaker turns on and begins announcing 'All Rebels Surrender Or Die'
